3: The artifact! They have taken the artifact! What to do!?
(Cough...)
Hahaha, good job! Well done, Camu, Vera!
Seeing that we were completely defeated and unable to fight, the satisfied King kept laughing, as if he was proclaiming his victory.
Cut the nonsense. You have more important thing to do now.
Right... Now that we already have the four fragments, I only need to shout out... Show yourself, Demon King's Castle!
Karenina kept struggling, trying to break away from Vera's control. The King sneered at her, then turned away and continued calling for the castle.
The summoning was successful eventually. A castle-like building suddenly appeared in the center of the empty land.
Take the Holy Maiden and that hostage. Let's go to the very end and enjoy our victory.
Finally, this time has come.
Following the King, Camu and Vera took Liv and Karenina into the Demon King's Castle, leaving behind only the guards and a few Constructs who just suffered a 'great loss.'
Commandant, are you hurt?
That's great. Let's start the next step.
Yeah. The artifact has already opened the way to the altar.
How can you still be so calm? The King has all the artifact now! If they ever get to the altar, we are all doomed!
The Holy Maiden will be forced to repair the artifact for him. It's over!
This world is over!
...The King does not have all the artifact yet. Don't worry.
Huh? But the gate of the Demon King's Castle is open. Doesn't that mean all the artifact is already there?
I don't really have the time to explain right now. Let's defeat the guards and go to the altar!
